option.value:
<vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="120dp" android:height="120dp" android:viewportWidth="120" android:viewportHeight="120">
<!-- Fox/Kitsune mask design --> <group android:translateX="60" android:translateY="60">
<!-- Mask base --> <path android:fillColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:pathData="M-30,-40 C-35,-45 -40,-40 -40,-30 L-40,30 C-40,40 -30,45 0,45 C30,45 40,40 40,30 L40,-30 C40,-40 35,-45 30,-40 L30,-35 C25,-45 15,-45 10,-35 L0,-30 L-10,-35 C-15,-45 -25,-45 -30,-35 Z" />
<!-- Eye markings --> <path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M-20,-20 C-25,-25 -15,-30 -10,-25 L-5,-20 C0,-15 -5,-10 -10,-15 L-15,-20 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M20,-20 C25,-25 15,-30 10,-25 L5,-20 C0,-15 5,-10 10,-15 L15,-20 Z" />
<!-- Eyes --> <circle android:fillColor="@color/black" android:cx="-12" android:cy="-15" android:radius="3" />
<circle android:fillColor="@color/black" android:cx="12" android:cy="-15" android:radius="3" />
<!-- Nose --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M0,5 L-3,10 L3,10 Z" />
<!-- Mouth --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:strokeColor="@color/black" android:strokeWidth="2" android:pathData="M0,15 C-5,20 -10,15 -8,10 M0,15 C5,20 10,15 8,10" />
</group>
</vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="120dp" android:height="120dp" android:viewportWidth="120" android:viewportHeight="120">
<!-- Fox/Kitsune mask design --> <group android:translateX="60" android:translateY="60">
<!-- Mask base --> <path android:fillColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:pathData="M-30,-40 C-35,-45 -40,-40 -40,-30 L-40,30 C-40,40 -30,45 0,45 C30,45 40,40 40,30 L40,-30 C40,-40 35,-45 30,-40 L30,-35 C25,-45 15,-45 10,-35 L0,-30 L-10,-35 C-15,-45 -25,-45 -30,-35 Z" />
<!-- Eye markings --> <path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M-20,-20 C-25,-25 -15,-30 -10,-25 L-5,-20 C0,-15 -5,-10 -10,-15 L-15,-20 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M20,-20 C25,-25 15,-30 10,-25 L5,-20 C0,-15 5,-10 10,-15 L15,-20 Z" />
<!-- Eyes --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M-12,-15 C-12,-16.66 -10.66,-18 -9,-18 C-7.34,-18 -6,-16.66 -6,-15 C-6,-13.34 -7.34,-12 -9,-12 C-10.66,-12 -12,-13.34 -12,-15 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M12,-15 C12,-16.66 13.34,-18 15,-18 C16.66,-18 18,-16.66 18,-15 C18,-13.34 16.66,-12 15,-12 C13.34,-12 12,-13.34 12,-15 Z" />
<!-- Nose --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M0,5 L-3,10 L3,10 Z" />
<!-- Mouth --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:strokeColor="@color/black" android:strokeWidth="2" android:pathData="M0,15 C-5,20 -10,15 -8,10 M0,15 C5,20 10,15 8,10" />
</group>
</vector>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <font-family xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="100" android:font="@font/poppins_thin" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="200" android:font="@font/poppins_extralight" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="200" android:font="@font/poppins_extralight" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="300" android:font="@font/poppins_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/poppins_regular" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/poppins_medium" /> <font
android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="600" android:font="@font/poppins_semibold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="800" android:font="@font/poppins_extrabold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="900" android:font="@font/poppins_black" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="700" android:font="@font/poppins_bold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="800" android:font="@font/poppins_extrabold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="900" android:font="@font/poppins_black" /> </font-family>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <font-family xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="100" android:font="@font/poppins_thin" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="300" android:font="@font/poppins_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/poppins_regular" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/poppins_medium" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="600" android:font="@font/poppins_semibold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="700" android:font="@font/poppins_bold" /> </font-family>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Featured Content Section (Anime Carousel) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/featured_section" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2 android:id="@+id/anime_carousel_viewpager" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<!-- Left Navigation Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/carousel_nav_left" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|start" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:background="@drawable/carousel_nav_button_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_left" android:contentDescription="Previous slide" android:elevation="4dp" />
<!-- Right Navigation Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/carousel_nav_right" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|end" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@drawable/carousel_nav_button_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" android:contentDescription="Next slide" android:elevation="4dp" />
<!-- Carousel Indicators --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/carousel_indicators" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Weekly Top 3 Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/weekly_top_3" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/weekly_top_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" />
<!-- Recent News Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/recent_news" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recent_news_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="true" tools:listitem="@layout/item_recent_news" />
<!-- Latest Review Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/latest_review" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/latest_review_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/item_latest_review" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Manga Carousel Section --> <include layout="@layout/manga_carousel" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- Popular Manga Updates Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/popular_manga_updates" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/manga_updates_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="true" tools:listitem="@layout/item_manga_update" />
<!-- Latest Manga Releases Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/latest_manga_releases" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/manga_releases_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/item_manga_release" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/dropdown_menu_bg" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp" android:elevation="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/menu_logout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="LOGOUT" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackground" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_logout" android:drawablePadding="12dp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_dark" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="35dp" android:paddingTop="50dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<!-- Hamburger Menu Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/menu_icon" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_menu" app:tint="@color/text_primary" android:contentDescription="@string/menu_description" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Welcome Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Welcome, admin" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- News/Manga Toggle --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/toggle_background" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:padding="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/news_tab" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:background="@drawable/tab_selected_yellow" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/manga_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/manga_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Featured Content Section (Anime) / Manga Carousel (Manga) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/featured_section" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2 android:id="@+id/anime_carousel_viewpager" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<!-- Left Navigation Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/carousel_nav_left" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|start" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:background="@drawable/carousel_nav_button_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_left" android:contentDescription="Previous slide" android:elevation="4dp" />
<!-- Right Navigation Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/carousel_nav_right" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|end" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@drawable/carousel_nav_button_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" android:contentDescription="Next slide" android:elevation="4dp" />
<!-- Carousel Indicators --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/carousel_indicators" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Manga Carousel (Hidden by default) --> <include android:id="@+id/manga_carousel" layout="@layout/manga_carousel" android:visibility="gone" />
<!-- Weekly Top 3 Section (Anime only) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/weekly_top_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/weekly_top_3" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/weekly_top_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" />
<!-- Section 1 Title (Dynamic: Recent News / Popular Manga Updates) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/section1_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/recent_news" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/section1_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="true" tools:listitem="@layout/item_recent_news" />
<!-- Section 2 Title (Dynamic: Latest Review / Latest Manga Releases) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/section2_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/latest_review" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/section2_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/item_latest_review" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_dark" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="35dp" android:paddingTop="50dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<!-- Hamburger Menu Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/menu_icon" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_menu" app:tint="@color/text_primary" android:contentDescription="@string/menu_description" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Welcome Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Welcome, admin" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- News/Manga Toggle --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/toggle_background" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:padding="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/news_tab" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:background="@drawable/tab_selected_yellow" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/manga_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/manga_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Anime Content (Visible by default) --> <include android:id="@+id/anime_content" layout="@layout/content_anime" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- Manga Content (Hidden by default) --> <include android:id="@+id/manga_content" layout="@layout/content_manga" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/carousel_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_overlay" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/carousel_genre" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="ACTION" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/carousel_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack on Titan" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="The story of humanity's last stand against the titans continues..." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<!-- Left side: Manga image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/manga_image" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="160dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" />
<!-- Right side: Manga content --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="160dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/manga_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack On Titan" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="In a world where memories can be bought and sold, Eiji wakes up with no past—only a haunting image of a city in flames. As he searches for the truth, he uncovers a memory-altering AI and begins to question whether his identity is even real." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:lineSpacingExtra="2dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="6" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/chapter" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chapter 110 - Hells of Tokyo" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="12sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:layout_gravity="bottom" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/news_image" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:background="@drawable/rounded_corners" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_date" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted on May 30, 2025" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack On Titan" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures known as Titans..." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Anime Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/anime_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" />
<!-- Content Area --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@color/background_dark">
<!-- Genre and Title (Horizontally Aligned) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_genre" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="ACTION" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:ellipsize="end" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:maxLines="1" android:text="Spring Reverie" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Reviews Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/anime_reviews" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="(1200 reviews)" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="10sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:gravity="start" />
<!-- Star Rating (Horizontally Aligned to End) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/star_rating_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:gravity="end">
<!-- Stars will be added dynamically -->
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom Info (Watching and Episodes) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="end">
<!-- Watching Count --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/info_box_bg" android:padding="6dp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginEnd="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_watching_count" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="3200" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Watching" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="8sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Episodes Count --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/info_box_bg" android:padding="6dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_episodes_count" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="25" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Episodes" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="8sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="110dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Anime Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/anime_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:contentDescription="Anime poster image" />
<!-- Content Area --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="6dp" android:background="@color/background_dark">
<!-- Genre and Title (Vertically Aligned) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_genre" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="ACTION" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="7sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:ellipsize="end" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:maxLines="2" android:text="Spring Reverie" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="8sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Reviews Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/anime_reviews" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="(1200 reviews)" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="6sp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:gravity="start" />
<!-- Star Rating (Horizontally Aligned to End) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/star_rating_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" android:gravity="end">
<!-- Stars will be added dynamically -->
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom Info (Watching and Episodes) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="end">
<!-- Watching Count --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/info_box_bg" android:padding="3dp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_watching_count" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="3200" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="6sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Watching" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="5sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Episodes Count --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/info_box_bg" android:padding="3dp" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_episodes_count" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="25" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="6sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Episodes" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="5sp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <dimen name="star_size">12dp</dimen> <dimen name="star_margin">2dp</dimen> </resources>
